text:
Hey Everybody!
I’m using OAuth to connect HubSpot.
After I login via the login page, I’m not redirected to my `redirect_uri` , instead I’m logged in.
Although if I’m logged in already, then it redirects to my `redirect_uri`
 I use this url ->
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxx&scope=content%20contacts&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%3A3000%2Fdeploy%2FHubSpot&state=%7Cintegration>```
And the login page has this url ->
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/login/?loginRedirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.HubSpot.com%2Foauth%2Fauthorize%3Fclient_id%xxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxx%26scope%3Dcontent%2520contacts%26redirect_uri%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Flocalhost%253A3000%252Fdeploy%252FHubSpot%26state%3D%7Cintegration>```
Can someone help me please on this issue?
Hi Stephen, that’s super helpful info - thanks. Seems like we’ll be using a mix of old and new as well
